description: This file defines a tool for fetching top stories from Hacker News, including the implementation of the tool function, and sets up an agent that uses this tool to respond to user queries.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that manages tools and responses.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches and returns the top stories from Hacker News as a formatted string.
